Title: Microsoft Viva: Thumbs Up Rate Metric for Microsoft 365 Copilot in Copilot Dashboard
Description:
Track user sentiment of Microsoft 365 Copilot. Understand how users perceive Copilot value by analyzing the breakdown of thumbs up and thumbs down ratings after Copilot interactions. See trends over time and breakdowns by group.
GA date: January CY2026
Preview date: December CY2025
